abstracts.cdata!:
The project will improve and increase
            the capacity of India's domestic telephone system
            during 1974/75 and 1975/76 by installation of additional
            exchange lines and associated facilities, expansion of long
            distance facilities, extension of service to rural areas,
            increase of telex services, and expansion of research and
            training facilities.
